contents.text: Thank you for calling AppDynamics in San Francisco, your partner in AI-driven application performance management.
Press 1 for sales and product information.
Press 1 to speak with a sales representative.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team at AppDynamics.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a demo with a sales representative.
I need to speak with a sales rep to see how AppDynamics can secure our mission-critical systems.
Discuss enterprise APM bundle options, including real-time analytics and AI-driven anomaly detection
I want to speak with a sales rep to learn what features your product offers.
I’d like to speak with a sales representative about which AppDynamics features best suit monitoring my university research applications.

contents.text: Press 2 for pricing and licensing details.
Please hold for our pricing and licensing specialists at AppDynamics.

navigationGoals: I need a detailed quote for enterprise licensing and subscription pricing.
I want to get detailed pricing and licensing options, including any veteran discounts.
Get detailed licensing and pricing breakdown for a 200-node hybrid-cloud APM deployment
I need to find out how much the software costs and what license options are available.
I’m calling to learn about student and academic pricing and licensing options for AppDynamics.

contents.text: Press 2 for technical support and customer service.
Please hold while we connect you to AppDynamics technical support.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting a critical performance issue in production.
I’m seeing performance alerts on my dashboard and need technical support to troubleshoot.
Troubleshoot persistent HTTP 5xx errors reported by the App Agent in my microservices architecture
I’m having trouble setting up the software and need technical support.
I need assistance configuring the AppDynamics agent for my Java-based simulation environment.

contents.text: Press 2 for account and billing inquiries.
Please hold while we connect you to account and billing support at AppDynamics.

navigationGoals: I need to clarify charges on my latest invoice and update my payment method.
I need to review a recent billing charge and update my payment method on my account.
Request invoice and billing details for our AppDynamics subscription’s quarterly charges
I’d like to review my invoice charges and update my payment method.
I have a question about a recent charge and need help with my AppDynamics billing and account.
